CustomField.description: This field converts the "specialist" feedback values to positive, negative or neutral
CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT( NS_Specialist_met_my_expectations__c ), "Strongly Agree","Positive", "Somewhat Agree","Positive", "Somewhat Disagree","Negative", "Strongly Disagree","Negative", "N/A" )
CustomField.label: Specialist Feedback Formula
